nodes.text: Nothoiin was a planet in the Anoat sector. It had a moon on which ur-diamonds were mined. During the Iron Blockade, a makeshift medical center on Nothoiin had to resort to smugglers to acquire supplies from Gerrenthum. The planet's native sentients species, the gold-skinned Nothoiins, once ruled the entire Anoat sector.

First introduced in the online roleplaying game supplement Galactic Gazetteer: Hoth and the Greater Javin, Nothoiin became canon when it was mentioned in a team raid on the mobile game Star Wars: Uprising
